answers.author: Stephanie Klinkenberger
answers.text:
The Mission of the Wellness & Prevention Program (City of Virginia Beach) is to empower employees and retirees with the knowledge and resources necessary to take an active role in: 
•Improving their quality of life, satisfaction, and overall state of health and well-being 
•Reducing health care costs through responsible wellness and healthcare choices. 
Attached is eligibility criteria.  If you have more questions, please feel free to contact us at muniref@vbgov.com

answers.author: Albert Tripp
answers.text:
Enclosed is a copy of Airway Heights' plan.  Also the Association of Washington Cities is an excellent resource for additional plans.  In Washington we developed our plan and submitted it to AWC.  After AWC approves the plan the city is provided with a 2% discount on medical premium payments.

author: Toni Shope
text:
Do you have a wellness plan?  If so please share. 
Thanks.
title: Wellness Plans
